All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bishop
The Bishop class represents a bishop chess piece
Board
The `Board` class represents a chess board.
ChessBoardGUI
The ChessBoardGUI class represents the graphical user interface for the chess board.
Game
The Game class represents a game of chess in Java.
InputPlayers
Used to get the names of the players from the user.
King
The King class represents a king chess piece
Knight
The Knight class represents a knight chess piece
Move
The Move class represents a move made by a piece on a game board in Java.
Pawn
The Pawn class represents a pawn chess piece
Piece
The Piece class represents a chess piece
Player
The Player class represents a player in a game of chess.
Queen
The Queen class represents a queen chess piece
Rook
The Rook class represents a rook chess piece
Square
This class represents a square shape.
UserInput
The UserInput class processes user input for the chess game.
